name: Fxxx Me Royally!! Horny Magical Princess
name_original: Fxxx Me Royally!! Horny Magical Princess
description:
Story


Marika is a princess from another world! In search of her future husband, Marika comes to planet Earth, where she meets two innocent male college students.

"Say, what do you guys think of me?"

"W-Well, you're very... forward...?"

"We may come from different cultures, but nonetheless, I do find you to be an attractive woman..."

Different worlds, different perspectives—can the princess overcome these obstacles and fall in love for the first time? ♪ Find out in this otome visual novel!
